body_html: There's some discussion on this topic on our forums. If you have any questions, I encourage you to ask them there. We'd like to keep issues limited to features requests and bugs. Thanks!

body: There's some discussion on this topic [on our forums](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/roadmap-for-torch-and-pytorch/38). If you have any questions, I encourage you to ask them there. We'd like to keep issues limited to features requests and bugs. Thanks!
